channel.title: Hybrid PVP Non Spawnable In Wildy
channel.description:
How can I make it so you can't spawn items in the wilderness?
-What's the code for it and file do I put it in?
-How can I make it so it sends a message saying "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness"?
Thanks,
Resent

item.title: Hybrid PVP Non Spawnable In Wildy
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

something like this

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights == 3) {
if (c.inWild())
c.sendMessage(“you cannot spawn in wilderness”);

			} else {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Hybrid PVP Non Spawnable In Wildy

item.title: Hybrid PVP Non Spawnable In Wildy
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Em… I have only coded for like a month and I am not very experienced with Hybrid PVP but I guess you can do something like this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
Your item command here :S
else if (c.inWild())
c.sM(“You cannot spawn items in wild.”);
}

This code is probably COMPLETELY wrong.
But yeah… You could try it out :S
